results.title: A Phase II Study of Preoperative Chemoradiotherapy with Capecitabine Plus Simvastatin in Patients with Locally Advanced Rectal Cancer
results.text_hl: This is the first study to evaluate the efficacy and safety of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ with preoperative CRT for @<m>DISEASE_Rectal_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012004 @@@LARC@@@.

A Phase II Study of Preoperative Chemoradiotherapy with Capecitabine Plus Simvastatin in Patients with Locally Advanced Rectal Cancer Cancer Res Treat. 2023 Jan;55(1):189-195. PMID: 35681110

results.title: SPAR - a randomised, placebo-controlled phase II trial of simvastatin in addition to standard chemotherapy and radiation in preoperative treatment for rectal cancer: an AGITG clinical trial
results.text_hl: SPAR - a randomised, placebo-controlled phase II trial of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in addition to standard chemotherapy and radiation in preoperative treatment for @<m>DISEASE_Rectal_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012004 @@@rectal cancer@@@: an AGITG clinical trial
